howItWorks.title: Using the Furniture Rental Platform

step1.title: 1. Register and create an account
step1.description: First, register as a user on the platform by filling in the required information. Creating an account gives you access to all platform features.

step2.title: 2. Add a listing
items: Choose the item you want to rent out or sell – it can be any piece of furniture, such as a sofa, table, or shelf.
Describe the item clearly: what it's suitable for, its condition, and dimensions (width, depth, height).
Specify whether you want to only rent, sell, or offer both options.

step3.title: 3. Add good photos
items: Take multiple pictures of the item from different angles and in good lighting.
Also show signs of wear or other details that help assess the condition.
At the same time, keep the visuals attractive – good presentation increases interest.

step4.title: 4. Optionally insure the item
step4.description: Although the platform does not offer insurance itself, we recommend insuring the furniture against damage. This protects both you and the renter.

step5.title: 5. Communicate and agree
items: When someone is interested, they will contact you through the listing.
Communicate directly and agree on the terms, including handover.

step6.title: 6. Listing fee and visibility
items: After the transaction, please remove the listing.
Want a new transaction? Add a new listing – again €1.

step7.title: 7. Item handover
step7.description: Agree with the interested party on how and where the item will be handed over – at home, at a neutral location, or using a transport service.

step8.title: 8. Completing the transaction and feedback
step8.description: We recommend leaving feedback – it helps the platform operate reliably and provides information about user trustworthiness.

howItWorks.conclusion: This way, you can easily rent out or sell your furniture and contribute to the circular economy by giving unused items a new life!
